children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-router-k8s/0 [idle] unknown: 
  mysql-test-app/0 [idle] waiting: 
  data-integrator/0 [idle] blocked: Please relate the data-integrator with the desired product
test_build_and_deploy
tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:

AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.96.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.96.9          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c

mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.96.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.96.11         
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     171  10.152.183.90   no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s                 0  10.152.183.56   no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.183  no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address     Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.96.13         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.96.9          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c
mysql-router-k8s/1   active       idle   10.1.96.8          Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.96.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.96.11         
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f5f6a35d240>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f5f6a35d240> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f5f6b0e3d90>.model
